Oscar Grant Plaza is bounded by 14th street on the south. The west side of the plaza is the site of [[Oakland City Hall]] and Oakland Police Headquarters.
Oscar Grant Plaza is bounded by 14th street on the south. The west side of the plaza is the site of [[Oakland City Hall]] and Oakland Police Headquarters.
â
The plaza is a 160,000 square-foot public space. Most of the plaza is composed of "''The Commons''", a raised lawn. The plaza also features a "''The Forum''", or amphitheater-- a public space for public gatherings and performances.<ref>Pyatok Architects [http://www.pyatok.com/portfolio/oaklandcityhallplaza.html Oakland City Hall Plaza]</ref>
+
The plaza is a 160,000 square-foot public space. Most of the plaza is composed of "''The Commons''", a raised lawn. The plaza also features "''The Forum''", or amphitheater-- a public space for public gatherings and performances.<ref>Pyatok Architects [http://www.pyatok.com/portfolio/oaklandcityhallplaza.html Oakland City Hall Plaza]</ref>
